GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
MIPS: SGI-IP27: Fix platform-device leak in bridge_platform_create()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit da2aecef866b476438d02c662507a0e4e818da9d, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 5dc76a96e95ae041c1d8e52714bd77576b35919b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: MIPS: SGI-IP27: Fix platform-device leak in bridge_platform_create()
OSV.details:
